about_the_game:
If you already have THE GAME OF LIFE 2 game, this is your chance to get all additional worlds, including:

  • FAIRYTALE KINGDOM -Take an enchanted quest through the ‘Fairytale Kingdom’. Study at the Wizard Academy or become a Knight in shining armour!
  • HAUNTED HILLS - Will you test your tasty brains at the Haunted College, or go straight into a ghoulish profession? The choice is yours!
  • FROZEN LANDS - Get in your sleigh and qualify as an Arctic Scientist, or hit the slopes as a professional Snow Sledder! A sparkling snowy landscape awaits!
  • AGE OF GIANTS - Experience a fantasy prehistoric land where pegs and dinosaurs live in perfect harmony. Survive life as a Dino Dentist, or speed from home to home as a Raptor Postman. New prehistoric choices await!!
  • SANDY SHORES - Go on a forever holiday to an island where the sun never sets and the skies are always blue. Ride the waves as a Surf Instructor, or dive beneath them as a Marine Biologist.
  • LUNAR AGE - Launch into orbit and build a new life on the furthest frontier! Become a Spaceport Operator, or graduate from the Lunar Academy and be a Blackhole Explorer.
  • SWEET HAVEN - Float into a land of sugar and cheer and get ready to dedicate your life to the art of candy-craft!
  • UNDER THE SEA - Turn the tide with every decision. Flash your fins in the mermaid outfit, become a Seaweed Tailor, make a splash in the Bustling Reef and invest in the Bank of Sunken Treasure!
  • EL DORADO - Journey into the mysterious deep jungle and discover ruins, treasure, and entire civilisations! Dress up as an Archaeologist. Go to the Explorer’s Academy. Become a Map Maker, or set off straight away as a Path Finder! In this world there is wealth to be found in every decision you make.
  • SUPERHERO WORLD - Gear up and set off on a journey to the Superhero World, where an extraordinary adventure awaits! Dress up as a Wonder Warrior in the powerful tech cycle, or harness the power of the stars as a Magical Girl while navigating in your Magical Scooter!


    Play now with your friends and family!
